api_list.api_description: Retrieves all entries in a given category.

required_parameters.name: category
required_parameters.description: The category to retrieve entries from.

api_list.api_description: Returns whether a given number is even.

required_parameters.name: number
required_parameters.description: The number you want to check.

query: I need to list all entries in the 'monsters' category of Hyrule Compendium and check if their total count is an even number.
